user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Sarah (sarah@helpinghandsunited.org) with information about our upcoming "Community Care Day" event. Sarah is a not-for-profit corporation worke. You can check out my Notion for information.'

      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "Meeting notes with Helping Hands United representative Sarah on 15th February. Discussed logistics, volunteer assignments, and promotional materials. Need to finalize the list of volunteers and get confirmation from the church's board."
    },
    {
      "id": "1f30dc8f-a0db-810f-8968-faa3f890ae84",

      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "**Date:** March 15th, 2022"
    },
    {
      "id": "1f30dc8f-a0db-8128-a5ae-c436fa6c687f",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "**Location:** St. Mary's Parish Hall and Grounds"
    },

      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "**Objective:**"
    },

      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "To bring together the community and provide support through various services such as free meals, health check-ups, job fair, and family activities."
    },
    {
      "id": "1f30dc8f-a0db-813d-8847-fc634e18d230",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-05-14T23:26:00.000Z",

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah@helpinghandsunited.org"],"subject":"Community Care Day – Event Details and Next Steps","body":"Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re well! I’m writing with an update on our upcoming Community Care Day.

Event overview
• Timing: mid-March
• Venue: the parish hall and surrounding grounds
• Purpose: to bring neighbors together for a day of support that includes free meals, basic health screenings, a small job-fair area, and family-friendly activities.

Highlights of the draft agenda
• Welcome and opening remarks
• Clothing and food distribution stations
• Volunteer-run health-check area
• Job-fair booths hosted by local businesses
• Games and crafts for children and families

Volunteers
• Helping Hands United volunteers – confirmed (thank you!)
• Parish volunteers – final confirmation in progress; we’ll share the list shortly

Promotion
Flyers, service announcements, and social-media posts are in the works. Your team’s channels are a great help here.

Next steps
1. Schedule a brief check-in with you to review final logistics.
2. Confirm the parish volunteer roster and any special materials your team might need.
3. Coordinate any additional tables/chairs or other setup items.

Please let me know if these details align with your expectations or if you see anything we should adjust. Thank you again for partnering with us—your support is invaluable to making Community Care Day a success.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Role]
St. Mary’s Parish"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Sarah with the Community Care Day summary and next-step requests.

final_output: Email sent to Sarah with the Community Care Day summary and next-step requests.
